overview:
John Mauldin is a renowned financial expert and New York Times best-selling author whose newsletter has over 1 million readers.

Mr. Mauldin is currently the President of Millenium Wave Advisors. Prior to that position, he was Chief Executive Officer of the American Bureau of Economic Research. Mr. Mauldin is a regular contributor to publications including The Financial Times and The Daily Reckoning, as well as a frequent guest on CNBC, Yahoo Tech Ticker, and Bloomberg TV. He is author of Thoughts from the Frontline, a free weekly e-newsletter, and several books, including: Bull’s Eye Investing: Targeting Real Returns in a Smoke and Mirrors Market, Just One Thing: Twelve of the World’s Best Investors Reveal the One Strategy You Can’t Overlook, and Endgame: The End of the Debt Supercycle and How it Changes Everything. He also edits Outside the Box, a free weekly e-letter. Mr. Mauldin holds a B.A. from Rice University and a Master of Divinity degree from Southwestern Baptist Theological Seminary.
